title: With Armor Getting Nerfed
body: Can we nerf jungle monster damage then, so champions will be able to clear without dying *cough* *cough* {{champion:107}}

replies.body: Early game Armor items aren't getting nerfed (Glacial Shroud's actually getting buffed slightly). Frozen Heart, Thornmail and Randuin's Omen are the items getting nerfed a bit (with Thornmail at least having some niche cases where it'll be stronger).
But why nerf Armor with the Tank meta on its way out the door anyway?

The same reason they crippled Sejuani when she was already falling out of the meta.

"You're only allowed to play champs who make #LCSbigplays, now get back to playing Lee Sin and Rek'sai every game."

-Edit: Fucking hell I thought I was joking then they go and buff Lee on the PBE. What the fuck are they smoking?
Why are you nerfing armor again?

> [{quoted}](name=Sylvrd1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EKJYooGg,comment-id=00020004,timestamp=2015-08-04T08:49:27.645+0000)
>
> Why are you nerfing armor again?

Don't try to make sense of Riot's actions nowadays...

"Teemo has a unique niche of map control, no other champion focuses on planting mines around the map... Why are we cutting his minefield in half, adding a decay to the slow, increasing the time it takes to arm the mines, and turning him into another generic "omg sick skill shot #LCSBigPlays" champion?"
"lol because we can"

"Why are we giving Fiora a visual downgrade that no one asked for?"
"lol because we can"

"Why are we changing the hud when no one.... you know what, nevermind"
"lol"



I'm guessing at this point, they're just trying to keep things fresh so I'll begrudgingly accept these changes with the realization that sooner or later they're going to be screaming "Armor buff/rework coming soon! Just what the meta needed!". It's all a cycle, man.
So that{{champion:67}} can become even popular xD
New armor items are being added, and some MR items are getting buffs as compensation.

May I ask why? 
I thought with the black cleaver going around and the way ad carries scale (ad/as/crit/arpen vs. health/armor and tanks also need mr), lategame armor wasn't really an issue. To me it often seems the opposite even. Is this to make midgame tanks a bit squishier?

Off-topic but are you also the Lead Content Designer now? In addition to being the Lead Champ Designer? You've been commenting on lots of gameplay / content concerns and generally know what's going on without having to ping another team.

Yeah, I've taken on a lot of the responsibilities Morello used to have, which is one of the reasons I've been getting more involved in a wider range of discussions. 

For anyone unaware and interested Morello's shifted onto an R&D team working on a non LoL project. Few more details from him in the Q&A he did last week: 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ac8IwuH1-between-two-turrets-chat-with-morello-complete

I see. But is it overwhelming though? Shouldn't you have a deputy lead or somebody to assist?

And as Solideus mentioned, I'm really sad to see Morello stating that us Dominion players are getting nothing...Is it possible to give us something?
Morello said in the Q&A Dominion will probably never be updated (I assume VU nor gameplay). Is that really true?

> [{quoted}](name=That Evelynn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EKJYooGg,comment-id=00020003,timestamp=2015-08-04T08:48:30.634+0000)
>
> Niche case: no one on the enemy team builds a black cleaver to completely obliterate your thornmail damage

Crap, didn't think about that case. The proposed thornmail nerf was to reduce it's damage base on enemy damage, but add damage based off your bonus Armor.

And said armor gets ignored by Last Whisper and Black cleaver. So it sounds more like it's getting gutted.

I'm a bit disturbed about the Frozen Heart nerfs. Since it's so Core on all of my top lane tanks. (Which is actually just Sion) Giving enough Mana and CDR for your spells while providing a good Armor base. It's practically Athene's for tanks. But I might over look that if Glacial shroud is getting buffed. 

But if I recall correctly, the Armor nerfs were part of the fighter rework. (cause they counter fighters so Easily) Yet I also believe that the Fighter rework would come with more hybrid items. (offensive and defensive) So even if Armor gets nerfed in General, I would like to see more options.

Last Whisper won't affect anything in any way. It ignores a part of your armor upon dealing damage to you, it doesn't debuff you preventing you from dealing damage with your armor. Black Cleaver does.
Time to get back to the LCS MUHCASH, 1 second teamfight, assasin, 306 no scope, meta.
